metadata.note: Scope 3 is inherently estimated. Spend-based Cat 1 factors carry ~50% uncertainty. Clearly disclose method in report. Travel factors verified against DEFRA 2024.

short_haul_flight.definition: Flights under 3,700 km, economy class. Includes radiative forcing index (RFI) uplift of 1.9x.

short_haul_flight_business.definition: Short-haul, business class. Higher seat width factor applied.

long_haul_flight.definition: Flights over 3,700 km, economy class. Includes RFI uplift.

long_haul_flight_business.definition: Long-haul, business class. 2.2x premium cabin uplift factor.

long_haul_flight_first.definition: Long-haul, first class. 4x premium cabin uplift factor.

rail.definition: National rail average, passenger-km. Includes all electricity + diesel mix.

international_rail.definition: International rail (Eurostar / high-speed rail), typically electric.

rental_car.definition: Average rental car, petrol/diesel market mix.

employee_commuting._note: Commuting emissions are estimated. Actual mode split survey is preferred if available.

avg_mixed_mode.definition: Mixed-mode estimate: 60% car, 25% public transit, 15% active (cycling/walking). Per one-way km per person.

public_transit.definition: Local bus + metro + rail weighted average.

purchased_goods._method: Spend-based EEIO (Environmentally Extended Input-Output). Primary method for SMEs without supplier data.
purchased_goods._uncertainty: ±50%. Disclose as estimated spend-based in report.

spend_based._source_note: EPA EEIO 2.0 (2023), USD factors converted at 1.08 USD/EUR average 2023

energy.source: EPA EEIO 2.0 — Mining, oil & gas, utilities
